translation.en: [Sara] Girls today can be anything.
translation.es: Hoy las chicas pueden ser cualquier cosa.

translation.en: CEO, Olympic golden medalist,
translation.es: Presidentas de empresas, ganadoras del oro olímpico,

translation.en: even a Supreme Court Justice.
translation.es: hasta juezas de la Corte Suprema.

translation.en: We've finally broken that glass ceiling
translation.es: Por fin hemos roto ese techo de cristal

translation.en: and, wow, it sure looks good from the top.
translation.es: y la vista es buena desde la cima, sin duda.

translation.en: -[giggles] Ah! -[Kenny] Stop!
Hey, go brush your teeth. Wipe her face.
translation.es: Ve a lavarte los dientes. Límpiale la cara.

translation.en: Did you find your homework? And you, my little friend, you need pants.
translation.es: ¿Encontraste tu tarea? Y tú necesitas calzones.

translation.en: Mom, can I stay home from school today?
translation.es: ¿Puedo quedarme en casa y no ir a la escuela hoy?

translation.en: Nobody's staying home.
-I feel sick. -What hurts?
My spleen.
Specificity is good, but that's over the top.
translation.es: Es bueno especificar, pero eso es demasiado.

translation.en: Next time, try tummy.
translation.es: La próxima, prueba a decir la pancita.

translation.en: It's go time. Let's go.
Okay, everyone's going to school. Mommy has something important to do.
translation.es: Todo el mundo a la escuela. Mamá tiene algo importante que hacer.

translation.en: [Amber] Oh, look.
[Kenny] Guys, look. Daddy's on TV again.
translation.es: Miren. Papá está otra vez en la tele.

translation.en: So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.es: Entonces ¿qué espera? ¿Que los cerdos vuelen? AUTOMOTORES BOLAND FINANCIAMOS - ¡APROBAMOS A TODOS!

translation.en: All right, let's go. Line up. Train's a-leavin'.
translation.es: Vamos. En fila. El tren se va.

translation.en: -Love you. Love you. -Bye.
-Bags in the back. -Love you.
Love you.
Love you.
Tuna fish. Keep it in the fridge. [sighs]
[Sadie] Stop, stop, stop. Mom.
[Annie] You make your dad drop you off all the way back here?
translation.es: ¿Le pides a tu papá que te deje tan lejos?

translation.en: I don't know. [chuckles]
What's the girlfriend drive?
Porsche Turbo.
Oh! I'm so sorry. Did you need this?
Love you, Sadie.
Can I have lunch money?
Ugh, come on. Did those kids take it again?
translation.es: ¿Esos chicos te lo quitaron de nuevo?

translation.en: God, those douchebags. That was a 20.
Well, small price to pay for the bone structure of my face.
translation.es: No es caro, para salvar la estructura ósea de mi cara.

translation.en: That's very true.
I don't wanna leave you without cash.
Excuse me, who is the adult here?
Don't answer that.
So, why aren't there any of these awesome women in my history book, huh?
translation.es: ¿Por qué ninguna de esas mujeres geniales está en mi libro de historia?

translation.en: I'll tell you why.
Sister made the mistake of getting her period.
translation.es: Las damas cometieron el error de menstruar.

translation.en: They say, "Behind every great man, there's a great woman."
translation.es: Dicen: Detrás de todo gran hombre, hay una gran mujer.

translation.en: Well, I say that's some bull right there.
translation.es: Yo digo que es una estupidez.

translation.en: Well, none of these nasty women I just told you about
translation.es: Ninguna de esas terribles mujeres de las que les hablé

translation.en: stood behind men.
translation.es: se quedó atrás de los hombres.

translation.en: -[pops lips] -They stood right beside them.
translation.es: Ellas se plantaron a su lado.

translation.en: So, we gotta get it done ourselves, ladies.
translation.es: Así que debemos hacerlo nosotras mismas.

translation.en: Am I right?
You get it, girl! You get it!
-We're gonna burn this patriarchy down! -Whoo!
Ain't nobody gonna stop her?
[chuckles] Okay.
[Ruby] Okay, I'm out of here.
What's going on? You got an early shift?
I figured, you know, we could use the extra.
translation.es: Pensé que las horas extra nos servirían.

translation.en: Mmm, I figured the same thing,
'cause I'm about to pull a double at the mall.
translation.es: porque haré turno doble en el centro comercial.

translation.en: I'll make it work.
-You always do, boo. -I do.
♪ And, oh, baby, let's make ♪
I cannot believe you.
Chill, sis. I'm, like, two minutes late.
translation.es: Calma, hermana. Son como dos minutos de atraso.

translation.en: How was Sara's thing?
Oh, she was so good.
She's so smart. I worry about mine.
translation.es: Es muy inteligente. Yo me preocupo por los míos.

translation.en: [chuckles] Stop it.
[sighs] All right, you all ready for this?
-[sighs] -Now or never.
[Ruby] Let's do it.
[Annie] All right! Everybody be cool, and nobody gets hurt!
translation.es: ¡Bien! Quédense tranquilos, y nadie saldrá herido.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is a robbery!
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, ¡esto es un asalto!

translation.en: -Oh, my lord! -[wax strip ripping]
Maybe we don't have to do the full Brazilian.
translation.es: Quizás no deba depilarme todo el vello púbico.

translation.en: Oh, a Brazilian would put you in the hospital. This is just brush control.
translation.es: Eso te mandaría al hospital. Solo lo rebajo.

translation.en: Yeah, I probably don't get in here as much as I used to.
translation.es: Probablemente no estoy viniendo tanto como solía.

translation.en: [sarcastically] No.
My husband and I aren't having a lot of S-E-X right now.
translation.es: Mi marido y yo no tenemos tanto S-E-X-O ahora.

translation.en: Maybe he just can't find it.
translation.es: Quizás él no te la encuentra.

translation.en: [sighs] Kids are back to school. I'm swamped. He's always working late.
translation.es: Los chicos volvieron a la escuela. Estoy abrumada. Él trabaja hasta tarde.

translation.en: Plus, there's so much on the DVR.
It's really kind of hard to schedule--
Okay.
Mrs. Boland? Your card was declined.
Are you sure?
I ran it twice.
I'm sure he just forgot to pay the bill. He's been very distracted lately.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que olvidó pagarla. Ha estado muy distraído últimamente.

translation.en: Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.es: Hola a todos. Soy Amber y estoy en Automotores Boland. CONCESIONARIA N.º 1 EN DETROIT AUTOMOTORES BOLAND

translation.en: We've got Chevys. We've got Fords. We've got Chryslers, too.
translation.es: Tenemos Chevy. Tenemos Ford. Tenemos Chrysler también.

translation.en: Have we got the car for you?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el auto que te va bien?

translation.en: Do you think I could make it in LA?
translation.es: ¿Crees que tendré éxito en Los Ángeles?

translation.en: It's not like Michigan. They have really good actresses there.
translation.es: No es como Michigan. Tienen muy buenas actrices.

translation.en: You're gonna win one of those fancy awards.
translation.es: Vas a ganar uno de esos premios soñados.

translation.en: Like a People's Choice.
I don't need all that. I just wanna be super famous.
translation.es: No necesito tanto. Solo quiero ser superfamosa.

translation.en: So, come on down to Boland Motors,
where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.es: y volveremos a hacer rugir su motor.

translation.en: Annie Bananie. Hey, you, uh, you got any plans later?
translation.es: Annie Bananie. Oye, ¿tienes planes para más tarde?

translation.en: My church is having a "bring a friend" night.
translation.es: Mi iglesia organiza una noche de trae un amigo.

translation.en: You know, I'm just not really much of a church person.
translation.es: No suelo ir mucho a la iglesia, sabes.

translation.en: You're definitely a stuck-up bitch.
translation.es: Sin duda, eres una perra engreída.

translation.en: I'm just kidding you.
Now, see, the old me totally would have meant that.
translation.es: Mi antiguo yo lo habría dicho en serio.

translation.en: But, uh, you know, born-again Boomer don't judge.
translation.es: Pero, sabes, el Boomer renacido no juzga.

translation.en: This, uh, came from your register last night.
translation.es: Esto apareció anoche en tu caja registradora.

translation.en: Know what it is?
Mmm. This is a tough one. It's a curling iron?
We in the biz say "counterfeit."
translation.es: En el negocio lo llamamos dinero falso.

translation.en: Now, see, I know it's counterfeit because I use the pen.
translation.es: Sé cuando un billete es falso, porque uso el detector.

translation.en: Did you use the pen?
Boomer, I don't remember if--
I'm guessing you didn't, because if you had,
translation.es: Creo que no, porque si lo hubieras hecho,

translation.en: you would have known it's counterfeit. Which is why we have the pen.
translation.es: habrías notado que era falso. Para eso tenemos el detector.

translation.en: So, unfortunately, I'm gonna have to dock this from your paycheck.
translation.es: Así que tendré que descontarlo de tu sueldo, lamentablemente.

translation.en: Boomer, that's, like, a whole shift for me.
translation.es: Espera. Eso es un turno completo para mí.

translation.en: Well, maybe next time you'll take security more seriously.
translation.es: Bueno, quizás la próxima vez te tomarás la seguridad en serio.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What security?
Excuse me, how much longer is the wait? 'Cause we've been...
translation.es: Disculpe, ¿cuánto hay que esperar? Porque hemos estado...

translation.en: [doctor] What I'm most concerned about right now is Stella's kidney function.
translation.es: Lo que más me importa ahora es la función renal de Stella.

translation.en: Sara.
-What? -You said "Stella." Her name's Sara.
Okay, so, what about her kidneys?
[sighs] One is failing. The other one's right behind.
translation.es: Uno está fallando. Y el otro, por fallar.

translation.en: I would suggest that we put Sara
on a list for a transplant as soon as possible.
translation.es: en una lista para trasplante, cuanto antes.

translation.en: Carla, you just can't throw files like this.
translation.es: Carla, no puedes agregarme todas estas fichas.

translation.en: [Carla] We just got ten walk-ins.
-I've been doing some reading. -Okay.
'Cause she can barely make it through the school day right now.
translation.es: Porque apenas puede aguantar la jornada escolar.

translation.en: [doctor] It's all willy-nilly over there.
-She can barely... -Okay? No.
...make it through the day, let alone soccer.
translation.es: ...aguantar el día, ni hablar de fútbol.

translation.en: You might wanna keep her home and get a tutor.
translation.es: Le recomiendo dejarla en casa y conseguir un tutor.

translation.en: Are those last week's blood draws?
translation.es: ¿Son las muestras de sangre de la semana pasada?

translation.en: Well, my husband and I work all the time...
translation.es: Mi esposo y yo trabajamos todo el tiempo...

translation.en: -Here, Carla. -...so we can't.
-And... -[doctor] Take them all away.
And the transplant lists can take months, right?
translation.es: Y las listas de trasplante pueden llevar meses, ¿no?

translation.en: [doctor] Separate. Thank you.
-And there's this new drug... -[doctor] Thank you.
translation.es: - Y hay un nuevo fármaco... - Gracias.

translation.en: -...that just got approved... -Take everything out.
Oh, my God! Can you please just listen to me for one damn minute?
Shame on you.
Shame on all of you. [crying]
[sighs] Eculizumab.
That's the name of the drug you're talking about?
-Yes. -It does.
It improves renal function dramatically.
It's also ten grand a month out of pocket.
translation.es: Y cuesta 10 000 por mes, al contado.

translation.en: And I'm guessing that may not be an option.
translation.es: Me imagino que no es una opción.

translation.en: Well, I'll talk to my husband. We might be able to swing it.
translation.es: Hablaré con mi esposo. Tal vez hallemos el modo.

translation.en: Okay.
[Beth] And she was only halfway through my wax.
translation.es: Y ella iba por la mitad de mi depilación.

translation.en: So, what happened?
Well, now I'm very uneven.
-[Ruby] I don't even wanna know. -[chuckles]
Dean maxed out their credit card at some lingerie store.
translation.es: Dean agotó su tarjeta en una tienda de lencería.

translation.en: Do you think he's sleeping around?
Don't nobody want Dean. It's a Christmas gift.
translation.es: Nadie desea a Dean. Será un regalo de Navidad.

translation.en: [Beth] In October?
Maybe it's your anniversary present.
translation.es: Tal vez sea por tu aniversario.

translation.en: He already gave me 100 coupons to Bed Bath & Beyond.
translation.es: Ya me dio 100 cupones para Bed Bath & Beyond.

translation.en: Ew. Really?
Son of a bitch.
No, I really do love it there.
No. That old guy is stealing your tip.
translation.es: No. Ese viejo te está robando la propina.

translation.en: He can't even walk.
-Go get it. -[Ruby sighs]
Shady SOB.
-Huh? Mmm-hmm. -[Ruby] Shady.
At my old job, we got robbed all the time. So I got the sixth sense now.
translation.es: En mi otro trabajo, siempre nos robaban. Ahora tengo un sexto sentido.

translation.en: Are you serious?
I mean, it's no big deal.
All the stores I work at eventually get hit.
translation.es: Siempre roban el lugar donde trabajo.

translation.en: -You could get shot. -Ugh. One can hope.
These guys, they don't want to hurt anybody.
translation.es: Esos tipos no quieren hacer daño.

translation.en: They just want the money. So we let them have it.
translation.es: Solo el dinero. Se lo damos.

translation.en: Nobody's trying to be a hero.
-Do they get caught? -[scoffs] Yeah, the dumb ones do,
'cause they park in the front by the security cameras.
translation.es: porque estacionan adelante, junto a las cámaras de seguridad.

translation.en: You gotta put your getaway car in the back by the loading dock.
translation.es: Debes dejar el auto en el fondo, junto a la zona de carga.

translation.en: And you never dick around with the registers.
translation.es: Y no debes ir a las cajas.

translation.en: The real money is back in the vault.
translation.es: El dinero grande está atrás, en la bóveda.

translation.en: You've really worked this out.
Just keeping my options open.
How much is in the vault?
Thirty grand, give or take.
Damn, I could use that money.
translation.es: Qué bien me vendría ese dinero.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Me, too.
So, when you wanna do this?
Well, I already bought three automatics and filed off the serial numbers.
translation.es: Compré tres pistolas y les limé los números de serie.

translation.en: So, really, name a day.
translation.es: Así que, en realidad, cualquier día.

translation.en: You should see your face.
It's whiter than usual.
[Annie] I'm gonna need you to all get on the ground.
Get your cell phones out of your pockets and keep your hands where I can see 'em.
translation.es: Saquen los celulares, pongan las manos donde yo las vea.

translation.en: All right, good.
Now, I need you to get your manager up here.
translation.es: Ahora, quiero que traigan al gerente.

translation.en: I said you need to get a manager up here right now.
translation.es: Dije que traigan al gerente, ya mismo.

translation.en: Hey, where's y'all's boss at?
I better get a manager up here right now or I will start capping people!
translation.es: ¡Mejor que venga un gerente enseguida, o empiezo a dispararles!

translation.en: I'm not even joking, mother--
-You the manager? -Over there.
Hey. Hey, you. You.
-You, squirmy. Hey. Hey. Hey. -[grunting]
Are you in charge here?
[stammering] Yes. Yes, I am.
[Beth] Okay, then, you listen to me.
You're gonna put on your big boy panties,
and you're gonna tell your customers to stay calm,
translation.es: dirás a tus clientes que se queden tranquilos,

translation.en: and this will be over real soon.
[Annie] Get out of there.
Everybody stay calm, okay?
Now, you're gonna take my friend here to the cash vault.
translation.es: Ahora llevarás a mi amiga al tesoro.

translation.en: Move it before I shoot your face off! Let's go!
translation.es: ¡Muévete, antes de que te vuele los sesos! ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Now! Now! Now!
[sighs] Oh, my God.
[Ruby] Hey, Deadpool, you wanna...
Seriously?
You won't call me back.
I was busy.
So, here I am.
Well, I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to be helping customers,
translation.es: Se supone que debo atender a los clientes,

translation.en: not chatting with my ex. So...
translation.es: no charlar con mi ex. Así que...

translation.en: So, now I'm a customer.
Nancy and I are suing you for custody.
translation.es: Nancy y yo te demandamos por la custodia.

translation.en: Club card?
There's a hearing next month. You should probably get yourself a lawyer.
translation.es: Hay una audiencia el mes que viene. Deberías conseguirte un abogado.

translation.en: You know, if you sign up now, you get ten percent off your purchase.
translation.es: Si se asocia ahora, tiene un descuento del 10 %.

translation.en: Annie, we were 17 when we decided all this stuff.
translation.es: Annie, teníamos 17 cuando decidimos todo esto.

translation.en: Sadie would be happier with us now.
translation.es: Sadie estaría mejor con nosotros, ahora.

translation.en: How do you figure, Greg?
We could send her to private school. St. Anne's.
translation.es: La mandaríamos a una escuela paga. St Anne's.

translation.en: She's an atheist who enjoys a jaunty bow tie.
translation.es: Ella es atea y le gusta su uniforme.

translation.en: I don't really think that Catholic school is a good fit.
translation.es: No creo que la escuela católica sea buena para ella.

translation.en: We could get her therapy.
She doesn't need therapy. She's figuring out who she is.
translation.es: No la necesita. Está descubriendo quién es.

translation.en: And that's all great, but she's getting bullied, Annie.
translation.es: Es genial, pero le hacen bullying, Annie.

translation.en: Yes, by dickhead kids that need therapy.
translation.es: Sí, unos pendejos que necesitan terapia.

translation.en: Who's watching her now? I mean, it's after midnight.
translation.es: ¿Quién la cuida ahora? Es más de medianoche.

translation.en: The neighborhood girl. She's very good.
translation.es: La chica del barrio. Es muy buena.

translation.en: The one who got the DUI?
translation.es: ¿La que fue presa por conducir intoxicada?

translation.en: She lives within walking distance.
Buy her a new computer. Hers has been broken for a month.
translation.es: Cómprale una computadora nueva. La suya está rota desde hace un mes.

translation.en: Why didn't she tell me that?
Because she said she didn't wanna freak you out.
translation.es: Porque dijo que no quería volverte loca.

translation.en: [Annie] Why is it so crazy?
I mean, it's a victimless crime. The store is insured.
translation.es: Es un delito sin víctima. La tienda está asegurada.

translation.en: Plus, you know they make us work through lunch?
translation.es: Además, nos hacen trabajar mientras comemos.

translation.en: So it's basically tit for tat when you figure in the lost wages.
translation.es: Es un toma y daca, cuando piensas en los salarios perdidos.

translation.en: Oh, that will hold up in court.
Hey, no pop before dinner, sweetie.
translation.es: No comas dulces antes de cenar.

translation.en: But she gets it.
That's because I am a grown-up.
Technically.
Okay. You know, can't you just have my back on, like, one thing ever?
translation.es: Bueno. ¿Podrías apoyarme una vez en la vida?

translation.en: This isn't me telling Mom and Dad that you smoked pot.
translation.es: No es como cuando les conté a nuestros padres que tú fumabas marihuana.

translation.en: -[kids laughing] -Which was incredibly lame, by the way.
This is me helping you not ruin your life.
translation.es: Trato de ayudarte a no arruinar tu vida.

translation.en: Oh, because your life is so great. I should want this life?
translation.es: Porque tu vida es maravillosa. ¿Debería desearla?

translation.en: I didn't say that.
You're, like, this Stepford mom without a pulse.
translation.es: Eres como un personaje de Las esposas perfectas, robotizada.

translation.en: I never said that.
You're cutting chicken fingers into stars. They're already fingers.
translation.es: Estás cortando dedos de pollo en forma de estrella. Ya son dedos.

translation.en: And I mean... not to pile on, but look who you married.
translation.es: Y además... No quiero ser cargosa, pero mira con quién te casaste.

translation.en: It's 20 years and four children. Marriage sometimes takes a little work.
translation.es: Son 20 años y cuatro hijos. El matrimonio requiere algo de trabajo.

translation.en: That is so romantic.
You could lose your daughter. Has that occurred to you?
translation.es: Podrías perder a tu hija. ¿Lo pensaste?

translation.en: Well, seeing as Greg is suing me for custody
translation.es: Bien, dado que Greg me demanda por la custodia

translation.en: and I can't afford to fight it,
translation.es: y no tengo dinero para el pleito,

translation.en: yes, actually, the thought has crossed my mind.
translation.es: sí, en realidad la idea se me pasó por la mente.

translation.en: I didn't know.
Now you know.
Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.es: ¡Hola! Soy Amber, de Automotores Boland. AUTOMOTORES BOLAND CONVENIENTE UBICACIÓN JUNTO A LA I-96

translation.en: Jeez. Who did this chick have to blow to get on TV? [scoffs]
translation.es: ¿A quién se la habrá chupado esta chica para estar en TV?

translation.en: [Amber] ...around town?
So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
So come on down to Boland Motors,
where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.es: y volveremos a hacer rugir su motor.

translation.en: Is your babysitter free?
Mmm. They took away her license. She's always home.
translation.es: Le quitaron la licencia. Siempre está en su casa.

translation.en: It's this charge here.
Could you just tell me exactly what was bought?
It's against policy to divulge information on previous purchases.
translation.es: Nuestra política es no dar información sobre compras previas.

translation.en: For privacy concerns.
Oh, but it's on her bill, so...
translation.es: Pero está en su factura, entonces...

translation.en: Then she should remember what she bought.
translation.es: Entonces ella debería recordar qué compró.

translation.en: Well, I remember that I bought it for a friend.
translation.es: Recuerdo que fue un regalo para una amiga.

translation.en: And she loved it so much, she really went nuts for it.
translation.es: Y a ella le encantó, la volvió loca.

translation.en: But then, she was in an accident.
With a driver. Texting.
translation.es: Con un conductor. Al enviar un mensaje.

translation.en: It was the other driver texting, not my friend. She'd never do that.
translation.es: El otro conductor enviaba un mensaje. Mi amiga nunca lo haría.

translation.en: But she's been in a coma ever since,
translation.es: Pero desde entonces está en coma,

translation.en: and her brain is, like, ten times the size it should be.
translation.es: y su cerebro tiene diez veces el tamaño normal.

translation.en: Um... I just thought, "Wouldn't it be a nice gesture,
if she wakes up..."
-When she wakes up. Stay positive. -Yeah.
"...to have her favorite pair of undies waiting."
translation.es: ...que se encontrara con su ropa interior favorita.

translation.en: 'Cause she was wearing the last pair
-when she got in the accident. -Mmm-hmm. Mmm-hmm.
And the paramedics had to cut them off of her.
translation.es: Y los paramédicos tuvieron que cortarlo.

translation.en: You know, Jaws of Life style.
Darn it, if I cannot remember the size that I got...
translation.es: Qué desastre, si no recuerdo su talla...

translation.en: And I obviously feel stupid asking her family.
translation.es: Y me sentiría tonta si se la preguntara a su familia.

translation.en: -Mmm, can't do that. -So could you just look it up?
translation.es: - No puedes hacer eso. - Así que, ¿no podría buscarla?

translation.en: Okay, just give me one second, please.
translation.es: Está bien, deme un momento por favor.

translation.en: Damn. That was a good sell.
This is so crazy. It'll be something for you.
translation.es: Es una locura. Seguro es algo para ti.

translation.en: Here it is. This was it?
Okay, yeah, that's probably not for you. [chuckles softly]
translation.es: Está bien, probablemente no era para ti.

translation.en: [Annie] Okay. It's gonna be okay. We're gonna have a drink. Oof...
translation.es: Está bien. Estará bien. Tomaremos un trago.

translation.en: We're gonna have ten drinks.
Uh, hey, do you know the difference between a Manhattan and a sidecar?
translation.es: ¿Conoces la diferencia entre un cóctel Sidecar y un Manhattan?

translation.en: I always forget. Something about vermouth whispering--
translation.es: Siempre lo olvido. Tiene que ver con el vermú...

translation.en: -[Ruby] Hey! -[Annie shushing]
Guess who found caramel bugles at Kroger?
translation.es: ¿Adivinen quién encontró bocadillos de caramelo en Kroger?

translation.en: What is going on? The Bachelorette is on. Hello.
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa? Ya comenzó The Bachelorette. Hola.

translation.en: [mouthing] Dean's having an affair.
What?
Dean is having an affair.
[mouthing] Dean is...
[normal] Son of a bitch.
Oh, honey. What can we do?
How about a screwdriver?
A sledgehammer.
What?
You planning on stopping this?
Nah. You?
Nah, I'm good.
What is it?
Oh, my God.
Does he have another ho?
[Beth] If you're looking for the vodka, I drank it.
translation.es: Si buscas el vodka, ya me lo bebí.

translation.en: [Dean] What are you doing in the dark?
Guess I'm used to it after 20 years.
translation.es: Debo estar acostumbrada, después de 20 años.

translation.en: What does that mean?
It means your child bride wears very expensive underwear.
translation.es: Significa que tu noviecita lleva ropa interior muy cara.

translation.en: What happened to us?
I was stupid.
I was stupid and...
It doesn't even matter.
Why do we have three mortgages that we haven't paid?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no hemos pagado tres cuotas de la hipoteca?

translation.en: Why do our credit cards all have advances on them
translation.es: ¿Por qué todas nuestras tarjetas tienen anticipos

translation.en: and we have hardly anything in our accounts?
translation.es: y apenas tenemos algo en nuestras cuentas?

translation.en: Look, I made a few bad decisions at work.
translation.es: Mira, cometí un par de errores en el trabajo.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I tried to fix it with a couple of investments,
translation.es: Traté de arreglarlos con unas inversiones,

translation.en: and I should have been...
I should have been more careful. I panicked.
translation.es: Debí ser más prudente. Entré en pánico.

translation.en: We have four children.
I know.
Are we going to lose this house?
Look, I dropped the ball. That's all.
Are we going to lose the house?
No!
I mean, I don't know.
Maybe.
We might.
We could lose everything.
[crying] I'm so sorry.
We're gonna rob that store.
What?
-We're gonna rob that store. -Yes!
Have you lost your mind?
[Ruby] We were just kidding about the store, Beth.
translation.es: Solo bromeábamos sobre la tienda, Beth.

translation.en: Hey, I wasn't.
-Well, I was. -Why? You need it just as bad as we do.
translation.es: - Yo sí. - ¿Por qué? Lo necesitas como nosotras.

translation.en: We just do it once. And we get some money.
translation.es: Lo haremos solo una vez. Conseguiremos dinero.

translation.en: Oh, dear God.
[Beth] You can help your little girl.
You can take care of this custody thing.
translation.es: Tú podrás pleitear por la custodia.

translation.en: And I get to save my family. And we're done.
translation.es: Y yo salvaré a mi familia. Y eso será todo.

translation.en: We never do it again,
and we don't sit back and let everything be taken away from us.
translation.es: y no nos quedaremos de brazos cruzados mientras lo perdemos todo.

translation.en: No one's gonna fix this. We have to do this ourselves.
translation.es: Nadie lo arreglará. Debemos hacerlo nosotras mismas.

translation.en: [Ruby] What is taking so long?
[Beth] I don't know.
-[girl whimpers] -Hi.
How old are you?
Let me guess. Six?
Do you watch Doc McStuffins? [chuckles]
Uh, yeah, we, um, used to... watch it in the Big House.
translation.es: Sí, solíamos verla en la cárcel.

translation.en: -[Annie] Move it, you little weenie! -Ow!
Uh, I'm going as fast as I can.
translation.es: Lo hago tan rápido como puedo.

translation.en: Come on!
Get out of the way!
Stay right there!
[Ruby] Holy crap.
We gotta go. We gotta go! We gotta go!
Oh, shit!
-[Ruby] Let's go! -[Beth] Nope. Turn around!
-Hurry! -[Annie] I got it!
-[Ruby] We gotta go! -[Annie] What?
[Beth] Go! Go! Go! Go, go, go!
Gotta go! We've gotta go.
There. Out there. They're going out the back!
Get them!
[Boomer] Get them! Get them!
[Ruby] Beth. Hello?
Are you okay in there? What's your name?
I robbed a grocery store.
[Ruby] Who's Secretary of State?
I robbed a grocery store.
Who is Secretary of State?
We robbed a grocery store.
Oh, we totally did.
And we actually got away with it.
Like some smooth criminals.
translation.es: Como a criminales de guante blanco.

translation.en: Uh, how much did we get? Tell me we got the 30.
We got it.
-[both sigh] -Thank you, God.
We got more than the 30 grand.
How much more?
What in the hell?
How is this even possible?
-Count it again. -I counted it right.
translation.es: - Cuenta de nuevo. - Los conté bien.

translation.en: Count it again!
You said there would be 30.
I said, "30, give or take." I guess it was give.
translation.es: Dije: 30, más o menos. Pensé que serían menos.

translation.en: Why does a grocery store even have this kind of money on hand?
Because it's hella shady. I told you this was a bad idea.
translation.es: Es muy turbio. Les dije que era mala idea.

translation.en: You guys are missing the point. We just won half a million dollars!
translation.es: Se están yendo de tema. ¡Ganamos medio millón!

translation.en: -We didn't win anything. -Half a mil, bitches!
We didn't win it!
We stole it!
And maybe the cops don't follow up on $30,000.
translation.es: Tal vez la policía no se ocupe de $30 000.

translation.en: They damn sure follow up on half a million dollars.
translation.es: Pero seguro que buscarán medio millón de dólares.

translation.en: What do we do?
Nothing.
We divide it up and we sit on it...
translation.es: Los dividimos y no los usamos

translation.en: until we can come up with a way to get rid of it quietly.
translation.es: hasta que podamos librarnos de ellos con discreción.

translation.en: Without looking like, you know...
-Criminals. -[Ruby] Yeah.
Okay?
Yeah.
Okay.
[clicks tongue] Okay.
Hey.
What is this?
Turbo S. You know, it's similar to the model that douche-face Nancy has.
translation.es: Turbo S. Es parecido al modelo que tiene esa imbécil de Nancy.

translation.en: But more features, more cylinders. You know, more cooler.
translation.es: Pero con más funciones, más cilindros. Mejor.

translation.en: Why don't you check under your seat?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no miras bajo tu asiento?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Who are you? Oprah?
You get a laptop, and you get a laptop, and you get a laptop!
I don't get it.
Uh, how to have fun? Yes, I can see that.
No. How you have money for all this.
Would you just let me worry about that?
translation.es: ¿Y si dejas eso en mis manos?

translation.en: -But-- -Who is the adult here?
-Mom. -Who is the adult?
Who's the adult?
Come on, let's go tailgate some old people.
translation.es: Vamos a viajar pegados a algunos viejos.

translation.en: Hey, Mrs. Boland, nice weather we're having.
translation.es: Hola, señora Boland, qué buen tiempo tenemos.

translation.en: Afternoon, Mrs. Boland.
I'm gonna have to call you back.
Uh, Mrs. Boland, hi. What are you doing here?
translation.es: Hola, señora Boland. ¿Qué hace por aquí?

translation.en: I'm here to clean up a mess, Amber.
translation.es: Vine a limpiar una cosa sucia, Amber.

translation.en: What mess?
You. Sit.
Don't worry. I mostly blame him.
translation.es: No te preocupes. El mayor culpable es él.

translation.en: He should know better. You're obviously stupid.
translation.es: Debió elegir mejor. Tú eres una imbécil, evidentemente.

translation.en: Oh, it's not a knock. We all have our strengths and weaknesses.
translation.es: No es tan grave. Todos tenemos virtudes y defectos.

translation.en: You're a beautiful dummy. It doesn't make you a bad person.
translation.es: Tú eres una bella idiota. Eso no te hace mala persona.

translation.en: So... here's what's going to happen.
translation.es: Así que... Esto es lo que ocurrirá.

translation.en: You're going to quit your job and my husband, effective immediately.
translation.es: Vas a dejar tu trabajo y a mi esposo, de inmediato.

translation.en: Trust me, they're both a dead end.
translation.es: Estás en un callejón sin salida con ambos.

translation.en: This is five grand.
Enough for a plane ticket and a little to get you started in LA.
translation.es: Bastante para el pasaje, y un poco para empezar en Los Ángeles.

translation.en: I do wanna warn you about something, though.
What's that?
Those folks out there, they take one look at a person like you...
translation.es: Allá la gente mira una vez a una persona como tú...

translation.en: The pretty, the dumb, the self-hating,
translation.es: Linda, estúpida, que se odia a sí misma,

translation.en: and they figure... perfect for porn.
translation.es: y piensan... Perfecta para el porno.

translation.en: Mrs. Boland?
Why are you doing this?
Because we both deserve more than a liar in a pig suit.
translation.es: Porque ambas merecemos más que un mentiroso disfrazado de cerdo.

translation.en: Me more than you, but still.
translation.es: Yo más que tú, pero aún así.

translation.en: That's the nicest thing that anyone's ever said to me.
translation.es: Eso es lo más lindo que me hayan dicho jamás.

translation.en: Really?
Uh, Mr. Boland?
Oh, no.
Doctor, I know you're busy and I won't waste your time.
translation.es: Doctora, sé que está ocupada y no le haré perder el tiempo.

translation.en: But I've been doing a lot of research here on different drugs and things.
translation.es: Pero estuve investigando distintos medicamentos y esas cosas.

translation.en: Um, it has this crazy-ass name.
Um, but I know it's all out of pocket.
translation.es: Pero sé que se paga al contado.

translation.en: You're touching me.
Why are you touching me?
Because you've been here for ten minutes and you've barely taken a breath.
translation.es: Porque ha estado aquí diez minutos y apenas ha respirado.

translation.en: The new med's a great option.
translation.es: El nuevo fármaco es una opción genial.

translation.en: Definitely worth trying before we go down the transplant road.
translation.es: Sin duda, vale la pena probarlo antes de ir a un trasplante.

translation.en: I've got samples.
We'll start her on it and see how she does.
translation.es: Se lo daremos y veremos qué tal le va.

translation.en: In the meantime, let's do a CT, creatinine clearance and an ultrasound.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, haremos una tomografía, depuración de creatinina y un ultrasonido.

translation.en: Cover all bases.
Mom.
-Can we get some water in here, please? -[man] Yes, of course.
Oh, is cucumber-infused okay?
[crying] Oh, my God, yes.
-[chuckles] -Can I get lemon, too?
Annie Bananie.
You forgot your paycheck. Lot of money in here. [chuckles]
translation.es: Olvidaste tu cheque. Hay mucho dinero aquí.

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, how did you have the balls to do it?
translation.es: Oye, ¿cómo tuviste los huevos para hacerlo?

translation.en: You and the girls get all get coked up or something beforehand?
translation.es: Las chicas y tú, ¿tomaron cocaína o algo?

translation.en: What?
I saw your ass tat.
translation.es: Vi el tatuaje de tu trasero.

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking--
How many chicks have a tramp stamp that says, "All You Need Is Love"?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas chicas tienen un tatuaje ahí que diga Todo lo que necesitas es amor?

translation.en: It's a very popular song.
Okay.
Well, then, uh, I guess you won't mind if I go to the cops then, right?
translation.es: Entonces, no te importará si voy a la policía, ¿verdad?

translation.en: If it wasn't you, I'm sure you got some explanation
translation.es: Si no fuiste tú, supongo que podrás explicar

translation.en: for how you bought all this on minimum wage.
translation.es: cómo compraste todo esto con tu salario mínimo.

translation.en: [grunts] I didn't say nothing.
Cops came, but I didn't tell them.
translation.es: Vino la policía, pero no les dije nada.

translation.en: What do you want? [shuddering] You want money?
It's not like that.
What's it like, then?
I got your back. I'm gonna keep my mouth shut.
translation.es: Te apoyaré. Mantendré la boca cerrada.

translation.en: Thanks.
I mean, I'm really gonna try.
I am. I hope I can. [inhales deeply]
I don't know. I just get so lonely.
translation.es: No lo sé. Es que estoy tan solo.

translation.en: Well... [chuckles] I'm sorry to be crass here, but, uh...
translation.es: Bien... Lamento ser burdo en esto,

translation.en: horny, too.
I just wanna shoot my mouth off.
Talk and talk till I'm, um...
translation.es: Hablar y hablar hasta que esté...

translation.en: satisfied.
-Can we just get it over with? Okay? -Oh, but, hey, hey.
translation.es: ¿Podemos hacerlo de una vez? Pero, oye.

translation.en: I'm not some "Wham! Bam! Thank you, ma'am."
translation.es: Yo no soy un toco y me voy.

translation.en: You know? I need a little romance.
Mom?
Hi, honey. I thought you were asleep.
And here it is. Found it.
He lost some change in the couch, so I was just helping him find it.
translation.es: Se le cayeron monedas en el sofá, y estaba ayudándolo a encontrarlas.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Yeah, no problem.
Oh, Sadie, honey, this is my, uh... Boomer.
translation.es: Sadie, cariño, él es mi... Es Boomer.

translation.en: I work with him at work. [chuckles]
translation.es: Trabajo con él en... mi trabajo.

translation.en: You know, so... But he has to go now, because he was... He has to...
translation.es: Pero... Tiene que irse ahora... Se estaba yendo... Porque debe...

translation.en: I have to use the quarters on the vending machines.
translation.es: Debo usar las monedas en las máquinas expendedoras.

translation.en: I was going to maybe fill a meter or two, to surprise someone.
translation.es: Iba a llenar de... monedas... un parquímetro, para dar una sorpresa.

translation.en: -Hey, that's nice. -Yeah. Pay it forward or whatever.
translation.es: Qué simpático. Devolver un favor, algo así.

translation.en: Just go.
[Boomer] You know, uh...
since I have all this bus fare now,
translation.es: Ya que ahora tengo un pase gratis para el autobús,

translation.en: I'll probably be back soon.
Good morning.
I'm gonna need the PINs and passcodes to the accounts.
translation.es: Necesito los números y las claves de las cuentas.

translation.en: Mortgage, bank, credit cards.
translation.es: La hipoteca, el banco y las tarjetas de crédito.

translation.en: Uh, it's 2 Fast 2 Furious.
It's the number two, like the movie.
translation.es: El número 2, no la palabra dos.

translation.en: I know it's a movie.
That's for all of them?
Yeah.
I handled the mortgage.
[stutters] How did you do that?
I handled it because you couldn't.
translation.es: Lo hice porque tú no podías.

translation.en: And this thing that we do...
where you bring home the bacon and I don't ask any questions?
translation.es: ...que tú traes el dinero y yo no hago preguntas.

translation.en: That's over.
Does that mean we get to stay in the house?
It means I get to stay in the house with the kids.
translation.es: Es decir que yo me quedo en casa con los chicos.

translation.en: You get to go to a motel.
translation.es: Tú te vas a un motel.

translation.en: Your clothes are in the car.
translation.es: Tu ropa está en el auto.

translation.en: Still no leads on last week's armed robbery of Fine & Frugal.
translation.es: Aún no hay pistas sobre el asalto de la semana pasada en Suave & Sobrio.

translation.en: A rep from the local...
You don't think it's weird?
What?
Our GoFundMe page has been up for years.
translation.es: Hace años que tenemos la cuenta para donaciones.

translation.en: Some anonymous donor rolls in now with all that cash?
translation.es: ¿Y ahora un anónimo dona todo ese dinero?

translation.en: [Ruby] It's a miracle.
Why question it?
See this?
I do.
-Yeah? Yeah? -[both laughing]
Our girl's coming back.
Yeah.
[chuckles] Hey... Okay, bruiser. All right, ease up on 'em. You got him.
translation.es: Bueno, fortachona. Calma. Ya lo tienes.

translation.en: -[Sara grunts] -[Stan] Look at you.
Hey, buddy. What's wrong?
You need to go potty? You need to peepee?
Nah, he's good.
We already took him out.
What do you want?
Oh, relax, sweetheart.
I just need you to call your lady friends over
translation.es: Solo necesito que llames a tus amigas

translation.en: so we can all have... a little talk.
About what?
Oh, about the money you stole from us.
translation.es: Sobre el dinero que nos robaron.

translation.en: Yo, this backsplash is dope.
translation.es: Este protector contra salpicaduras es genial.

translation.en: Hey, what's it made out of? Marble?
Yo, you ever get any problems with staining back here?
translation.es: ¿Han tenido problemas con las manchas aquí atrás?

translation.en: Like, if you're cooking a big pot of spaghetti sauce
or something like that?
No, I don't think so.
No? [chuckles]
We didn't know you owned the store.
translation.es: No sabíamos que la tienda era suya.

translation.en: I look like some kind of grocery store manager to you?
translation.es: ¿Tengo cara de gerente de un supermercado?

translation.en: Or, like, Rotary club or something?
No, let's just say that we got certain arrangements
translation.es: No, digamos que hay cierto arreglo

translation.en: with some local businesses.
And we help each other out and whatnot. You know?
Like... money laundering for drugs? I told you it was shady.
translation.es: ¿Algo como lavado de dinero del narcotráfico? Les dije que era turbio.

translation.en: Why don't you stop worrying about my business dealings
translation.es: No se preocupen por mi negocio,

translation.en: and start figuring how you're gonna pay me my money back.
translation.es: y piensen cómo van a devolverme el dinero.

translation.en: -We can get it back. -Oh, that would be great.
Most of it.
Sorry, what?
[Annie stammers] Some of it, for sure.
[sighs] Oh, what, like you guys didn't spend a dime?
How much, Annie?
I don't know. I probably spent, like, a hundred... grand.
translation.es: No lo sé. Creo que gasté cien mil, más o menos.

translation.en: [both] What?
I'm gonna shoot you myself.
translation.es: Te voy a matar yo misma.

translation.en: Nah, you're just gonna pay me back is all.
translation.es: No, solo me devolverán el dinero.

translation.en: I mean, right quick, too. With interest.
So, we'll see you real soon, yeah?
You've really got to be careful, ladies.
I mean, with citrus on marble, like lemon and whatnot.
translation.es: Con el mármol y los cítricos, digo, como el limón y esas cosas.

translation.en: That stuff will erode like crazy.
[Kenny] Why can't Daddy come home?
translation.es: ¿Por qué papá no puede venir a casa?

translation.en: Your daddy and I love you so much. And I know it's confusing.
translation.es: Su papá y yo los queremos mucho. Y sé que es difícil de entender.

translation.en: Daddy's gotta stay here while he and I work on some grown-up stuff.
translation.es: Él debe quedarse aquí para que arreglemos unos problemas de adultos.

translation.en: You can have whatever candy you want -from the vending machines, okay? -[kids] Yay!
translation.es: Pueden comer todos los dulces que quieran de las expendedoras, ¿sí?

translation.en: -Hey. -Pick the kids up from school
translation.es: - Hola. - Busca a los niños en la escuela

translation.en: and bring them straight back here. Don't go to the park or anywhere.
translation.es: y tráelos directamente aquí. No vayas al parque ni nada.

translation.en: I can't have the kids here. I've got, like, one twin bed.
translation.es: No puedo tenerlos aquí. Solo hay una cama gemela.

translation.en: You just have to.
What's going on?
I can't tell you.
Wait. Uh, stop. Are you okay?
Just take care of my babies.
Hey, who wants, uh... Who wants pizza?
-[Kenny] I do! -[kids cheer]
I would have picked you up down the block, but your cell was off.
translation.es: Te hubiera recogido en la otra calle, pero tu celular estaba apagado.

translation.en: [Sadie] Where's the Porsche?
I sold it. I had to.
Is that a cassette deck?
What?
And manual roll-down windows?
Yas, Queen.
Mmm-hmm. Cloth interior. Nice. Leather burns your ass.
translation.es: Interiores de tela. Son lindos. El cuero te quema el trasero.

translation.en: How did you get to be so awesome?
Don't ride in Porsches.
[Ruby] Who is it?
I said, who is it?
-[Stan] Me. -[sighs]
Stan.
[laughs] What the hell are you doing?
I want an alarm system. And can you please fix the back gate?
translation.es: Quiero un sistema de alarma. Y por favor, ¿arreglarás el portón trasero?

translation.en: I said I would.
-Yeah. -Okay.
You said it, but it just sits there, wide open.
translation.es: Lo dijiste, pero sigue abierto como siempre.

translation.en: Got your bat out.
You could've gotten the knife out of the drawer, baby.
translation.es: Y podrías haber sacado el cuchillo del cajón.

translation.en: All right. I'm sorry.
-I'm sorry. Calm down. I'm sorry. -[groans] God.
You scared? Your heart's beating. Come here. Breathe. Breathe.
translation.es: ¿Tienes miedo? Tu corazón palpita fuerte. Ven aquí. Respira.

translation.en: What did I tell you?
All this right here is all the security you need, baby.
translation.es: Todo esto de aquí es la única seguridad que necesitas.

translation.en: -You don't need no Wiffle bat. -Hmm. Is that so?
Yeah, that's so, because your man here, you know...
translation.es: Sí, porque aquí tu hombre, sabes,

translation.en: is no longer gonna be trailing teenagers at the Great Steak & Fry.
translation.es: ya no vigilará adolescentes en el Great Steak & Fry.

translation.en: -You applied to the police academy? -I did.
translation.es: - ¿Te anotaste en la escuela de policía? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah. I didn't tell you in case I got rejected.
translation.es: Sí. No te lo dije por si me rechazaban.

translation.en: Brother ain't get rejected.
Oh. Detroit's finest, baby. Protect and serve.
translation.es: Policía de Detroit. Proteger y servir.

translation.en: Give me some.
-[Beth] Where are we at? -[Ruby] Short.
[Beth] By how much?
[Ruby] Over sixty grand.
-[sighs] -What about the car?
I took it back. Lost over half its value, B-T-dubs.
translation.es: Lo devolví. Perdí más de la mitad del precio, además.

translation.en: Well, maybe you shouldn't have bought it in the first place.
My, what a helpful contribution. Let me just grab my time machine.
translation.es: Qué gran ayuda. Lo arreglaré con mi máquina del tiempo.

translation.en: Oh, my God. We should just go to the police.
translation.es: Dios mío. Deberíamos ir a la policía.

translation.en: [Annie] Wait. What?
[Ruby] We haven't done anything that bad yet. We don't have records.
translation.es: Aún no hicimos nada tan malo. No tenemos antecedentes.

translation.en: [Annie] Uh, yes. Now we do.
[Ruby] If we just explain to them that--
Explain what, that we meant well?
Gee, Officer, we're sorry. We didn't mean to piss off the gang.
translation.es: Disculpe, agente. No queríamos enojar a los mafiosos.

translation.en: -We just wanted to rob the grocery store. -Okay, I'm just trying not to die, okay?
translation.es: Solo queríamos robar la tienda. Solo intento salvar la vida. Si tienes un plan mejor...

translation.en: -If you have a better plan-- -Actually, yes, I do.
translation.es: Solo intento salvar la vida. Si tienes un plan mejor... Pues sí lo tengo.

translation.en: We should take it from somewhere else.
We'll just steal it and then we'll pay them back
and then we'll just put the whole thing to bed.
Bitch, are you out of your mind?
-It's the best possible plan! -[Beth] Enough!
Enough!
Enough.
We're gonna get that money. We're gonna figure it out.
Because we are strong and resourceful.
And we've accomplished way harder than this.
translation.es: Y hemos logrado cosas mucho más difíciles.

translation.en: I once made 300 cupcakes in one night,
translation.es: Una vez hice 300 bocaditos en una noche

translation.en: and they were nut and gluten-free.
The kid still had an allergy attack.
translation.es: Sin embargo, al chico le dio alergia.

translation.en: And you don't always have to fact-check me, okay?
translation.es: Y no tienes que corregirme siempre, ¿oyes?

translation.en: I'm gonna take a shower.
I smell like booze and crime.
[Ruby] Call you tomorrow.
-[sighs] Boomer, I, uh... -Oh? Bad time?
Very.
Hey, come on. Don't be rude.
Oh, God. Boomer, you're wasted.
You know, I was just thinking about how we didn't finish what we started.
translation.es: Sabes, pensaba en cómo terminaremos lo que empezamos.

translation.en: -Boomer, it's not... Stop. Stop. -[chuckles] What?
Why don't we just have a little bit of fun?
Boomer, hey, hey. Stop.
My sister is here.
[pants] Yeah? Is she hot?
I'll be fast, I promise.
-Did you just hit me? -[panting]
No! No!
[panting and grunting] No!
[grunts] Stop! No!
You're hurting me!
That's how you like it, right, tough girl? Come on. You can rob a store, right?
translation.es: Te gusta así, ¿verdad, chica dura? Puedes robar una tienda, ¿no?

translation.en: Get off of her!
-Whoa! Hey, hey, hey. Hey, easy. -[crying]
All right, no need to get upset.
All right? No need to get upset.
Oh, do I look upset? Why would I be upset?
Because every man in the world thinks
he can do whatever he wants whenever he wants?
translation.es: que pueden hacer lo que quieran, cuando quieran?

translation.en: Okay, okay. Hey, we were just having a little bit of fun. All right?
Oh, was that what that was? Because you see...
when a lady screams "stop,"
it is usually because she is not having the time of her life.
translation.es: suele ser porque no la está pasando muy bien.

translation.en: But what do I know?
Now, you're gonna pull up your pants
and you are gonna get the hell out of here.
Get out!
Is that a...
toy gun?
No.
[sighs] Yeah, it is.
No, it's not.
Okay, then...
shoot me, hmm?
You stupid bitches.
You're going down.
Boomer! Boomer! Please! You need money? We'll get you money.
-Oh, no, I'm turning you in. -Boomer, please. Please.
translation.es: - No, voy a denunciarlas. - Por favor, Boomer.

translation.en: You know how fast they're gonna lock you up
-and take away your loser kid? -No, Boomer. Please.
translation.es: - y te quitarán a tu fracasada hija? - No. Por favor.

translation.en: Yeah, your dumbass sister, too. The two of you are so done.
translation.es: Sí, y a tu tonta hermana. Ambas están acabadas.

translation.en: You're gonna rot in jail.
Yeah, you think you're so much better than everyone.
translation.es: Sí, creen que son mejores que cualquiera.

translation.en: Well, now you are finished. It is over.
translation.es: Bien, ahora están perdidas. Se acabó.

translation.en: No, please! [screams]
-Oh, my God! -[groans]
You...
Is he...
He's not.
No.
Are you sure?
No.
[sighs] What do we do now?
We're not going to the police.
